article_title: Teva Buying Allergan Generics For $40.5B As Emerging Markets Boost Drug Spending

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: Teva Pharmaceuticals (TEVA) said it has agreed to buy the generic drug business of Allergan (ACT) for $40.5 billion as emerging markets spend more on prescription drugs and more Americans gain health coverage and look for cheaper medicines. The deal will put Teva among the largest drug makers in the world [...]
